detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ODECoin (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#94-128) has payable functions:
	 - ODECoin.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#111-112)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [ODECoin](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#L94-L128) has payable functions:
	 - [ODECoin.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#L111-L112)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description: Parameter StandardToken.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#78) is not in mixedCase

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#46)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#78-80)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#88-90)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#47)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#62-67)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#49)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#51)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#82-86)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- ODECoin.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ODECoin.sol#111-112)
